SELECT distinct app.id,app.application_no,app.app_type,app.status,app.service_id,app.IS_FAST_TRACKING, T2.id APP_CORR_ID,T4.ID APP_GRP_ID, T3.HCI_CODE,T3.HCI_NAME,T3.VEHICLE_NO,T3.ID APP_GRP_PREM_ID, T3.BLK_NO, T3.FLOOR_NO, T3.UNIT_NO, T3.STREET_NAME, T3.BUILDING_NAME,T3.POSTAL_CODE, null PREMISES_ADDRESS, CONCAT(case T3.BLK_NO when null then null when '' then null else ''+T3.BLK_NO end , case T3.STREET_NAME when null then null when '' then null else ' '+T3.STREET_NAME end , case T3.BUILDING_NAME when null then null when '' then null else ' '+T3.BUILDING_NAME end , case T3.FLOOR_NO when null then null when '' then null else ' # '+T3.FLOOR_NO end , case T3.UNIT_NO when null then null when '' then null else '-'+T3.UNIT_NO end , SUBSTRING (( SELECT ', #' + pou.FLOOR_NO +'-'+pou.UNIT_NO FROM app_premises_operational_unit pou WHERE pou.PREMISES_ID =T3.ID ORDER BY SEQ_NUM ASC FOR XML path('') ), 1, 1000) ,case T3.POSTAL_CODE when null then null when '' then null else ', '+T3.POSTAL_CODE end ) AS ADDRESS, T4.LICENSEE_ID, appRec.RECOM_IN_DATE , insAppt.RESCHEDULE_COUNT,insApptCorr.STATUS INS_APPT_STATUS
FROM APPLICATION_GROUP T4 LEFT JOIN APP_GRP_PREMISES T3 ON T4.ID = T3.APP_GRP_ID LEFT JOIN APP_PREMISES_CORRELATION T2 ON T2.APP_GRP_PREM_ID = T3.ID LEFT JOIN APPLICATION AS app ON T2.APPLICATION_ID = app.ID LEFT JOIN app_premises_inspector_correlation insApptCorr ON (insApptCorr.APPLICATION_NO = app.APPLICATION_NO AND insApptCorr.STATUS='CMSTAT001') LEFT JOIN app_premises_recommendation appRec ON (appRec.APP_PREM_CORRE_ID = T2.ID AND appRec.RECOM_TYPE='RETYPE006' AND appRec.STATUS='CMSTAT001') LEFT JOIN app_premises_inspection_appt insAppt ON (insAppt.APP_PREM_CORRE_ID = T2.ID AND insAppt.STATUS='CMSTAT001') WHERE app.STATUS != 'APST009' AND appRec.RECOM_IN_DATE is not null AND insAppt.RESCHEDULE_COUNT is not null <#if licenseeId??>AND T4.licensee_id = :licenseeId</#if>
